title: Setup of Mqtt Server and iot devices for zsupport company office
description: Development of a Mqtt server and iot devices for the office of zsupport company in Porto, Portugal. The devices are used to monitor the office environment and control lights and other devices.

title: Multiple IoT devices for home automation and tinkercad projects
HINA - Home IoT Iinteligent assistant
description: A project that uses a Arduino and bluettoh / wifi micro commponents to control home devices and monitor the environment. It includes a hlographic ilusion of a virtual asisstant that uses voice commmands to control the devices and monitor the environment.
